Hi, friends! I'm FANHOTIX! I create funny videos with different gameplays of Tiles Hop with music. My channel differs from similar ones in that I create videos with a special approach: first, i using the Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Photoshop, I cut out characters for further editing, and then add unique sound and video effects. 
All my video features materials protected by the Fair Use guidelines of Section 107 of Copyright Act. It takes about 5 hours to create these videos so that my viewers can feel the difference between the original video and the video I created.

The audio and video sources in this video were created in such a way that the viewer hears and sees the new UNIQUE content.
